resource.title: The "Festival Yield" Pricing Calendar
resource.description: Digital calendar template with pre-marked festival dates, suggested pricing multipliers, and minimum stay rules for capturing peak revenue.
resource.painPoint: Hosts miss massive revenue spikes by not adjusting prices for local festivals they might take for granted.
keyFeatures: Event Peaks: Pre-marked dates for high demand
Pricing Multipliers: Suggested rate increases (e.g., 2.5x for New Year)
Minimum Stay Rules: Reminders to enforce min-stays during peak periods
